name: Detective Hayseed - The Cloning Madness
description:
The town of Monroe is world famous birthplace of a revolutionary technology, that enabled cloning of the human race. With the development of this technology and its wide application, the entire town is in its heyday. The production of clones in the company “DNA Revolution” takes on gigantic proportions and the dealers sell cloned celebrities and personalities all over the world. These clones act as doubles for politicians or famous artists. The world can also use the abilities and wisdom of cloned scientists, military commanders and others. The town is prospering and the standard of living is high. And at this very moment, the town is preparing for a highlight of the whole year – the cloned beauty contest. And it is the moment where crime corrupts the town’s plans. Join the crazy police detective Francis and go through countless escapades with him in this classic point & click adventure full of comedy.

  • 2D hand-drawn comic book stylized graphics, now available in widescreen 4K resolution
  • More than 50 game screens and locations and hundreds of items
  • A story full of comedy and twists
  • Stylish music and sounds
  • Game time 8-10 hours
  • Guide is available in case of getting stuck
  • Classic point & click adventure game
  • Fully dubbed in English
